abstract: This presentation based on my paper by the same name gives a brief overview of the main results and implications for policymakers and groups interested in addressing inequalities in access to digital financial services.
place: Presentation for the Better than Cash Alliance
alt: The first slide of a presentation, reading "Empty digital wallets: new technologies and old inequalities in digital financial services among women", Laura Caron, Columbia University, June 2022. There are icons of a wallet and a vibrating mobile phone.
shorttitle: Empty digital wallets: new technologies and old inequalities in digital financial services among women
